resources.string: A clever guessing game where impostors must be uncovered before they guess the secret word!

Each player gets a secret word – except the impostor(s). They only see “Impostor” or a vague clue. Then, each player says a word related to the secret one. Try to identify the impostors based on what everyone says. Once all impostors are found, they get one chance to guess the secret word. If they guess correctly, the impostors win. If not, the rest of the players win.
